title: The Matrix
description: A man discovers that the world is a simulation.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new home.

title: The Dark Knight
description: A vigilante fights crime in Gotham City.

title: Inception
description: A thief enters the dreams of others to steal secrets.

title: The Godfather
description: The story of a mafia family in New York.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Intertwined stories of crime and violence.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life of an extraordinary man who lived through historic events.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes join forces to battle a powerful enemy.

title: Star Wars: A New Hope
description: A young farm boy joins forces with rebels to defeat the Empire.

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different classes fall in love aboard the Titanic.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince overcomes betrayal and tragedy to claim his kingdom.

title: The Terminator
description: A cyborg assassin is sent back in time to kill the mother of the future leader of the human resistance.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI agent seeks the advice of a cannibalistic serial killer in order to catch another serial killer.

title: Schindler's List
description: The true story of Oskar Schindler, who saved over a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

title: Jaws
description: A great white shark preys upon a small island community.

title: The Prestige
description: Two magicians engage in a bitter rivalry, each trying to outdo the other with their illusions.

title: Django Unchained
description: A freed slave teams up with a bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The story of Jordan Belfort's rise and fall as a corrupt stockbroker.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: A laid-back slacker is mistaken for a wealthy man with the same name and is pulled into a crime-related adventure.

title: Back to the Future
description: A teenager is sent 30 years into the past in a time machine invented by his close friend.
